task.title: Select Content to Feature From Studio
task.shortdesc: You can select content to feature from Studio instead of an App.

step.cmd: From Studio, click the + sign beside a piece of content.
Select the Featured tag in the dropdown list.
Click Enter to Feature the piece of content.
step.stepresult: The tag will be saved and displayed beside the piece of content.

step.cmd: To stop featuring a piece of content, click the x on the Featured tag displayed on the piece of content.
